name: wETH Single Sided Strategy
description: Supplies {{token}} to the liquidity pool on Curve [here](https://www.curve.fi/steth/deposit) to obtain [steCRV](https://etherscan.io/address/0x06325440D014e39736583c165C2963BA99fAf14E) tokens which it then puts into the v2 Curve stETH Pool yVault ([yvsteCRV](https://etherscan.io/address/0xdcd90c7f6324cfa40d7169ef80b12031770b4325)) to gain yield.
